name: Reset User Password
description: Resets a user's password by patching passwordProfile. Requires User-PasswordProfile.ReadWrite.All (Application), admin consent and appropriate Entra role assignment

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the user. id or userPrincipalName should be specified.

userPrincipalName.title: UserPrincipalName
userPrincipalName.description: Principal Name of the user. id or userPrincipalName should be specified.

userNewPassword.title: UserNewPassword
userNewPassword.description: New password, to reset the old one. Let empty to generate a random password

forceChangePasswordNextSignIn.title: ForceChangePasswordNextSignIn
forceChangePasswordNextSignIn.description: Determines if the user must change their password on the next sign-in.

forceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa.title: ForceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa
forceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa.description: Determines if the user must perform a multifactor authentication (MFA) before being forced to change their password.
